Utilize the power of the sun: Sunlight has natural disinfecting properties, so letting sunlight in the room can help kill germs and bacteria.
Use homemade cleaning solutions: Create your own cleaning solutions using common household items like lemon juice, salt, and hydrogen peroxide.
Use hot water: Hot water can be used to sanitize surfaces and kill germs.
Practice good hygiene habits: Wash your hands regularly with soap or water, and use paper towels to clean surfaces.
Utilize the power of essential oils: Certain essential oils, like tea tree oil, have antibacterial properties and can be used to disinfect surfaces.
